title: Loot Kaand
overview: Loot Kaand follows the adventures of the siblings Latika and Palash in the small town of Purulia in West Bengal, where they plan a unique bank heist to save their ancestral house. But unbeknownst to them, dark and sinister forces beyond their control are at play and soon the siblings get trapped in a situation surrounded by vicious gangsters and corrupt policemen.
